articles.title: Follow-up campaigns: new trigger
articles.desc: The follow-up campaigns can now be triggered when a user confirms their email address.

articles.title: Improved security and reliability
articles.desc: We improved security and reliability of our code by adding new automated tests.

articles.title: RSEventsPro: featured events first
articles.desc: We added a setting in the email editor with RSEventsPro to display featured events first in the inserted events list.

articles.title: Zoo: new field types and selection
articles.desc: The Zoo integration add-on now handles more field types and lets you select which fields to insert in your emails.

articles.title: Community Builder: new exclusion conditions
articles.desc: The way users are filtered in the Community Builder Subscription integration has been improved to also include AcyMailing users with no subscription when you select an exclusion condition.

articles.title: RSEventsPro fix menu item
articles.desc: We fixed the menu item ID option for RSEventsPro.

articles.title: Compatibility with SEBLOD
articles.desc: We fixed a compatibility issue with SEBLOD latest version.

articles.title: Follow-up campaigns: fix add-on activation
articles.desc: We fixed an error that blocked the display of the follow-up campaigns listing when you deactivate an add-on used in one of the follow-up campaigns.

articles.title: Automation: fix blank page
articles.desc: We fixed an error that could occur when trying to create an automation that caused a blank page to be shown.

articles.title: WordPress standards
articles.desc: Default templates are now stored differently to better match WordPress standards.

articles.title: Auto-update fix
articles.desc: In some cases the auto-update of AcyMailing could install the free version instead of the current edition. The update process has been reworked to avoid this.

articles.title: AcyMailing header fix
articles.desc: We fixed an issue that could occur on some new WordPress installations where the AcyMailing header caused a fatal error in the plugin.

articles.title: Contact Form 7 fix
articles.desc: Fixed an issue with Contact Form 7 integration, preventing the subscriber creation

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Subscription form: fix double display
articles.desc: The subscription form in popup mode could be shown twice in some cases, this has been fixed.

articles.title: Security: fix base64 image loading
articles.desc: We added a security when loading base64 encoded images in the editor.

articles.title: Email: fix email without email address
articles.desc: We have fixed the error that could occur when sending a campaign to users without an email address.

articles.title: Editor: fix video loading
articles.desc: We fixed an issue when loading videos in the editor video block.
